00042 class CelExtractOptions
00043 {
00044 public:
00045 
00046   // Input files
00047   std::string cdfFile;                   ///< Name of cdf-file.
00048   std::string spfFile;                   ///< Name of spf file
00049   std::string pgfFile;                   ///< Name of pgf file
00050   std::string clfFile;                   ///< Name of clf file
00051   std::string bgpFile;                   ///< Name of bgp file
00052   std::vector<std::string> celFiles;     ///< Cel files to analyze.
00053 
00054   // Basic options control runtime
00055   std::string help;                      ///< Are we doing help? What kind?
00056   int verbosity;                         ///< Our verbosity level.
00057   bool force;                            ///< Don't check chip type.
00058   
00059   int m_output_precision; ///< precision of output
00060 
00061   // Set output content
00062   std::vector<std::string> probesetIdsFiles;           ///< File of probeset IDs/Names to load
00063   std::vector<std::string> probeIdsFiles;              ///< File of probe IDs to load
00064 
00065   bool pmOnly;                           ///< Do we only dump PM probes
00066   bool ignoreProbesWithoutMM;            ///< Do we ignore probes that do not have MM
00067   bool pairWithBackground;               ///< Do we show the background values (ie mm, gcbg, ...)
00068   bool subtractBackground;               ///< subtract background from value reported
00069   std::string outFile;                   ///< Output file
00070 
00071   // Analysis Stream Options
00072   std::string analysisString;            ///< An analysis string (no quant method) to use to extract intensities
00073   std::string sketchInFile;              ///< File specifying
00074 
00075   // Things filled in
00076   std::string progName;                  ///< Name of this program (generally what would appear in argv[0])
00077   std::string version;                   ///< Version of program.
00078   std::string cvsId;                     ///< Cvs id string.
00079   std::string commandLine;               ///< String we were called with.
00080   std::string timeStr;                   ///< Date and time of execution.
00081   std::string execGuid;                  ///< Execution id.
00082 
00083   // Disk Mode
00084   bool useDisk;
00085   std::string diskDir;
00086   int diskCache;
00087 
00088   /**
00089    * Constructor
00090    */
00091   CelExtractOptions();
00092 
00093   /**
00094    * Destructor
00095    */
00096   ~CelExtractOptions();
00097 
00098 };

00100 class CelExtract
00101 {
00102 public:
00103   /**
00104    * Constructor.
00105    */
00106   CelExtract(CelExtractOptions &o);
00107 
00108   /**
00109    * Destructor.
00110    */
00111   ~CelExtract();
00112 
00113   /**
00114    * Do the extraction
00115    */
00116   void extract();
00117 
00118   /**
00119    * Dump intensities iterating over probes
00120    * @param iMart - the intensity mart to use -- already allocated, but not loaded
00121    * @param tsv - the tsv object to write to
00122    */
00123   void doProbe(IntensityMart *iMart, std::vector<affx::TsvFile*>& tsv, bool bDoSaturationReport=false);
00124 
00125   /**
00126    * Dump intensities iterating over probe sets
00127    * @param iMart - the intensity mart to use -- already allocated, but not loaded
00128    * @param tsv - the tsv object to write to
00129    */
00130   void doProbeSet(IntensityMart *iMart, std::vector<affx::TsvFile*>& tsv);
00131 
00132   /**
00133    * Setup the TSV file for output, write headers, define columns, open ostream
00134    * @param tsv - TsvFile object
00135    */
00136   void defineExtractTsv(std::vector<affx::TsvFile*>& tsv, bool bDoSaturationReport=false);
00137 
00138   /**
00139    * Set the various probe level annotations for a specific probeset
00140    * @param tsv - the TsvFile object
00141    * @param columnCount - the column to start with. will be updated.
00142    * @param ps - pointer to the probeset
00143    * @param aIx - the atom index (relative to probeset)
00144    * @param plIx - the probe index (relative to probeset)
00145    */
00146   void tsvSetProbeAnnotations(affx::TsvFile* tsv, int &columnCount, ProbeSet *ps, int aIx, int plIx);
00147 
00148 private:
00149   /**
00150    * Check the options for correctness
00151    */
00152   void checkOptions(CelExtractOptions &o);
00153 
00154   /**
00155    * Create an analysis stream object
00156    */
00157   AnalysisStreamExpression *newAnalysisStreamObject();
00158 
00159   /// order of probesets if probeset list given
00160   std::vector<int> m_PsOrder_jhg;
00161   /// our copy of the options
00162   CelExtractOptions m_Options;
00163   /// the number of rows on the chip
00164   int m_NumRows;
00165   /// the number of columns on the chip
00166   int m_NumCols;
00167   /// the number of features on the chip
00168   int m_NumFeatures;
00169   /// number of data channels in CEL file
00170   int m_NumChannels;
00171   /// column index of first CEL file
00172   int m_FirstCelColIndex;
00173   /// vector of output file names for each channel
00174   std::vector<std::string> m_OutFiles;
00175   /// mask of which probes to dump
00176   std::vector<bool> m_ProbesToDump;
00177   /// our chip layout info. NULL if no layout.
00178   ChipLayout *m_Layout;
00179   /// pointer to analysis stream
00180   AnalysisStreamExpression *m_as;
00181   /// pointer to analysis stream
00182   AnalysisStreamFactory *m_asFactory;
00183   /// list of gc probe IDs
00184   std::vector<int> m_gcProbes;
00185   /// Order of probes for disk mart
00186   std::vector<int> m_ProbeOrder;
00187 
00188 };
